org.apache.felix.ipojo.extender.internal.processor

Class ConfigurationProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.felix.ipojo.extender.internal.processor.ConfigurationProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BundleProcessor, Lifecycle

    public class ConfigurationProcessor
extends Object
implements BundleProcessor
    Processor looking for classes annotated with @Configuration and creating the corresponding instance declaration.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private static class  ConfigurationProcessor.ComponentsAndInstances
      Container storing the components and instances declared by a bundle.

    • Field Detail

      • m_logger

        private final Log m_logger
        The logger.

      • m_registry

        private final Map<Bundle,ConfigurationProcessor.ComponentsAndInstances> m_registry
        Registry storing the bundle to components and instances declared within this bundle. Only instances are expected.

      • m_enabled

        private final boolean m_enabled
        Set to false to disable this processor. When an OSGi framework does not provide the wiring API, this processor is disabled.
